core

Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Term
      • core.Variable

  • public class Variable
extends Term
    Class that represents a variable A variable is a Term and additionally has a name

      • Variable

        public Variable(Sort sort,
                java.lang.String name)
        Creates a variable with sort sort and name name.
        Parameters:
        sort - The sort of the new variable
        name - The name of the new variable
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is empty or sort is null
        See Also:
        Sort, Term.Term(Sort)

      • getSubstitution

        public java.util.Map<Variable,Term> getSubstitution(Term term,
                                                    java.util.Map<Variable,Term> substitutions)
        Description copied from class: Term
        Returns a substitution such that the substitution applied to this term yields term. If this is not possible it returns null
        Specified by:
        getSubstitution in class Term
        Parameters:
        term - The term that should be obtained by applying the substitution
        substitutions - The substitutions that are already defined, can be modified by this function
        Returns:
        A substitution such that if the substitution is applied to this term it yields term, or null if such a substitution is not possible
        See Also:
        Variable

      • applySubstitution

        public Term applySubstitution(java.util.Map<Variable,Term> substitution)
        Description copied from class: Term
        Applies a substitution (a mapping from variables to terms) on this term. Hence, after execution every variable in this term is replaced by substitution.get(variable)
        Specified by:
        applySubstitution in class Term
        Parameters:
        substitution - A substitution which replaces variables by terms
        Returns:
        A new term such that all variables in substitution im this term are replaced by substitution.get(variable)
        See Also:
        Variable
